attributes.action: Treat 'crash for cash' as a crime against society - because it has a direct detrimental effect upon all of us.
attributes.additional_details: For which the mandatory automatic only available sentence should be life imprisonment without any opportunity for parole or other early release.  Because within seconds of being released these people will be doing it again, as ALL our convicted and released criminals do.  WE MUST STOP THIS COUNTRY FROM BEING A SOFT TOUCH FOR EVERYBODY WHO IS SIMPLY NOT PREPARED TO BE PART OF OUR WAY OF LIFE.
